decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNoSpacing">The applicant will, ensure that the recommendations of
the approved Bat Emergence Survey report are implemented in full with regard
to:<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNoSpacing"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p><p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:
l0 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]-->a.<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-kerning: auto; font-optical-sizing: auto; font-feature-settings: normal; font-variation-settings: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><!--[endif]-->The
approach to be taken with regard to works involving the roof covering and/or
attic space<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:
l0 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]-->b.<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-kerning: auto; font-optical-sizing: auto; font-feature-settings: normal; font-variation-settings: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><!--[endif]-->Any
external lighting provision</p>

<p class="MsoNoSpacing">the development shall not progress beyond damp proof
course level, until the details below are submitted to the Council for approval
in writing a plan providing details and elevation drawings for the
incorporation within the building fabric at just below roof eaves level:<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNoSpacing"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p><p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:
l0 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]-->a.<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-kerning: auto; font-optical-sizing: auto; font-feature-settings: normal; font-variation-settings: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><!--[endif]-->Positioned
on the rear elevation, <u>either</u> three Schwegler FR2 bat tubes (or suitable
functional equivalents) situated level side by side so as to permit animals to
move between the three boxes <u>or</u> one such bat tube providing access to a
suitable custom cavity within the unoccupied part of the roof cavity<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:
l0 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]-->b.<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-kerning: auto; font-optical-sizing: auto; font-feature-settings: normal; font-variation-settings: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><!--[endif]-->Two
Schwegler universal bird bricks (or suitable functional equivalents), one on
each side elevation in the rear extension.<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNoSpacing"><br></p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The window(s) in the flank elevation(s) of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Two storey rear extension; first floor front to side extension; alterations and extension to raise roof height; two front and two rear dormers; rooflights in both side roofslopes; conversion of garage to habitable room with installation of window to front; external alterations
